website_summaries.verdict: Thin but comfortable, these no-show socks are perfect for low-cut sneakers, providing comfort without adding bulk.
pros: These socks conform to the feet well without being too bulky
Cuff holds well to the heel
A blend of 80% cotton and 20% spandex makes for comfortable stretch and sweat absorption
cons: Toes can punch through easily if the sock is tugged too hard

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description/quantity
customer_reviews.text: While socks are generally sold in pairs, this one isn’t. Bought a 6 pack and found 6 socks and not 6 pairs. This is misleading because there is a 3 pack as well. Does a 3 pack include 3 socks and not 3 pairs? That sure is unheard of. Returning it. While it is hard to prove that this is inaccurate, it sure is misleading the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Make this right!
customer_reviews.text: See photo > this is literally the first time I wore these socks. I am very sad, considering all of the positive reviews, that these did not last more than a few hours. I hope the manufacturer will make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Ktufjar

customer_reviews.title: Socks are a tad small, and tissue paper thin ...
customer_reviews.text: Socks are a tad small, and tissue paper thin. I wear a size 7.5/8 and keep my toenails very short and my toes still ripped through these (every single pair) within hours of wearing them once.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Jean Norris

customer_reviews.title: they are not shaped like the socks pictured on the feet
customer_reviews.text: These socks are alright. They are a little on the small/tight side. Also, they are not shaped like the socks pictured on the feet. They sit much lower on the top. Know that they will fit invisibly under some shoes, but not all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for the first time today and already have holes in the toes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They WILL rip
customer_reviews.text: I'm a women's size 8.5 or 9 depending on the shoe. These fit great but a year later virtually all of them developed holes in the big toe and are now trash. I have ones from Hue that are made out of a sturdy cotton. I have had them for years and still in great shape. These and others that are made of stocking type material will not hold up. I use these for my sneakers while working out and my spin shoes (I can't stand socks showing). I use them for workouts so maybe they will be better for leisure use.
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: The good: You can't see them when you wear them ...
customer_reviews.text: The good: You can't see them when you wear them inside low ankle boots. The bad: They do not stay put for anything. The elastic is too loose, and the gel at the back of the heel (which starts to disappear with the first wash) did absolutely nothing to keep them in place. I kept having to stop walking down the sidewalk to fix them because they were bunched around my toes. I'm really surprised at all the good reviews on here - I thought maybe at first it was an issue with the particular shoes I was wearing, but I've given them a chance with all different kinds of shoes now. Sentence: Ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THESE EEDOR SOCKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THESE EEDOR SOCKS!! I have purchased the multi-color 8 Pack more than once, to have a little extra...Why? Because I'm overweight, and I have trouble with my feet swelling often. I have had SO much trouble over the years finding socks that will fit me and feel good. My search is over!!! Love the colors...love the softness...love the quality...love that a larger size is offered..and I love the price too. To say that I'm thrilled is the truth...because I finally found something that stays on my foot, looks nice, and feels good. :D
customer_reviews.author: Saved by Jesus’ Grace

customer_reviews.title: I usually don't like wearing shoes without socks and thought I'd give these ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear with my Tom's. I usually don't like wearing shoes without socks and thought I'd give these a try. I wore them all afternoon and they did not slip off my heels. However, the material is thin, I don't know how long they will last but they're cheap enough to where I would repurchase. Also, I really liked that they couldn't be seen while wearing my shoes. Just a bit of the edge could be seen but it wasn't noticeable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Boodozer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, non-slip no-show socks
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by these socks. Usually, thin no-show socks are simply a "no-go" for me, as they slip down immediately and I have to throw them away. But these stay in place all day, and are comfortable all day. They are very cool and lightweight, and the silicone at the heels keeps them from slipping down. And they really are no-show -- I wear them with my Sketchers slip-on shoes.I'll definitely be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: L. OsborneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Holes in toes after one wear.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought these were the perfect no-show socks; thin, good fit and no-slip gel pad. I wore them thinking these are great! I should buy more! I get home from work, take my shoes off and boom...hole in toe. Mind you I do not have toenails that could cut through socks. So needless to say I was disappointed. Next pair, same thing. Pair after that, same thing. Fourth pair? Yep. Same. So I'm just going to wear through the pack till they're all unwearable then I'll try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: Video Review!!!
customer_reviews.text: Watch it and its unboxing video in higher quality on my Youtube channel: skyforce95
customer_reviews.author: skyforce95

customer_reviews.title: A no-show sock that stays put and is affordable
customer_reviews.text: I have tried countless brands of no show socks. Most all end up in the trash. The constantly slide off the back of my foot. I read about these through a blog group I belong to and thought to give them a try. I, too, had only had luck with bombas since they come in sizes, but the price is really difficult to justify. I wear a size 7-7.5 women’s shoe. I really like that these also come in sizes. I followed the sizing chart and they fit perfect. The price is extremely reasonable, too. Bought my sister a set in her size as well since her 6-6.5 foot has even more issues. I will buy these again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hessong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and coverage
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second pack of the nude, white, and black combo packs. I love these things! They provide the perfect amount of coverage. I had a hard time finding socks that are truly 'no show,' but that also will not slip off of your heel during the day. These have become my favorite 'no show' socks. I wear them with all of my Vans and Keds, and also with some of my slip-ons and boat shoes. I wear a size 8 -9 shoe, and I got the pack sized for 8-11 shoes. They are very stretchy, and I haven't had an issue with holes yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: Great Best find ever!
customer_reviews.text: Never had any luck finding a low profile type sock to wear with slip on shoes that would actually stay on, Until now. These are very soft and don't make feet sweat, they are perfect for sketcher type slip on shoes. If you suffer with bunions, hammer toes, these stretch wide enough to be comfortable and stay on. The rubber type edge on these socks is not noticeable when wearing them and does not rub any blisters. I have not washed any yet as i just got them, so have to let you know how they fair in washer and dryer. But for right now, great find.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: I love them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little foot socks. I'ts been years since I have found any that fit so well and are so comfortable. They are ightweight, so not hot and thin enough for all my shoes, while adding a layer of comfort between my feet and the inside of the shoe. These EEDOR socks are so much better than the little socks of yesteryear. Color selection is great and the price is right. It's been a long time since I have been this pleased with a purchase. Please don't discontinue these socks. Many thanks, C. J. , Redmond, oregon
customer_reviews.author: Karo

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These work as far as not showing and seem like they will stay in place, but the material seems really cheap, almost like they are intended to be disposable. I wear size nine shoe and these were a bit large for me, but I think they will still work out ok. If you are smaller than a size 9 shoe definitely order the smaller size sock. I will keep and use them, but I doubt they will hold up for more than a few wears each pair. If they were a better material and a touch smaller they would be great as the design/shape is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shute

customer_reviews.title: Okay but small
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good socks. Super thin, stretchy, and stay put. The front had too much coverage to be worn with ballet flats, but I got these to wear with sneakers, so that’s okay by me. My complaint is that these run small. I don’t know that I believe they have sizes at all, as the package came unmarked. I got the L (women’s 8-10), and I’m a women’s 8.5, so they should be on the bigger size. They are uncomfortably tight on my toes, I actually have to take them off when I take my shoes off because they bother my big toes. There is no larger size, so I won’t be buying these again. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AmieF07

customer_reviews.title: No show, No smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. I've already ordered a second set, and the men's set for my husband. I recently got into wearing fashion sneakers all of the time and didn't want to ruin my cute kicks with stinky-ness, so I ordered these and they're PERFECT. Nice long toe so they don't slip off the front, and the heel has a little rubber grippy thing to keep them on the back. I've had zero problems with them slipping around inside of my shoe. My shoes are all smelling fresh, and they also protect against rubbing blisters, which I really appreciate. I even love these for inside of my spin shoes, which are really tight!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I got them 6.5 in nude, I am a 6-6.5 depending on the shoe. They definitely fit me snug, but the next size up would’ve been too large. Didn’t shrink in the washer or dryer. They stay on ALL DAY. They DONT budge. They do, however, come up the top of the foot pretty high (most likely why they stay so well). I wear them with Tom shoes, they show a little bit. Doesn’t bother me because black or nude matches or blends in with my black Toms. I wouldn’t be able to wear them with my more shallow topped, dressy flats. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Solomos

customer_reviews.title: Fit awesome, til your toes bust out
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I wear a shoe size 8. I bought the largest size in these socks, and when I first got them, they fit PERFECT. I needed something to wear with my loafers, and I thought these would do a great job. After just one day of very moderate walking around in said loafers (I work at a desk), I was already starting to see a big hole form over the top of the big toe of these socks (and yes, I keep my nails trimmed!). These socks would be amazing if they were just a bit more durable. I'm honestly amazed that there aren't more reviewers with this problem!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love these Socks!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST no show socks I've ever owned! Not too thin, Not too thick, just right! and they do not slip off the heel, gotta love that! I don't like being totally barefoot around the house, and these work great for this 73-yr-old grandma to slide around the house on my wood floors (they're not slippery). I also wear them to take out trash, trips to the garage, walking company to their car, etc. Wash and dry beautifully, too. I wear shoe size 8-8 1/2 and these fit perfectly. Probably would be a bit short for women with shoe size 10-11, but maybe not since they're pretty stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pence

customer_reviews.title: Third purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks, wear them under my Sperry's and slip on Converse all the time. Back to buy my 3rd pack. I've never had an issue with holes or ripping. I'm a woman shoe size 11 and the largest size fits me fine!
customer_reviews.author: Sam J

customer_reviews.title: size matters
customer_reviews.text: i ordered these in the 7-7.5 size first (that is my normal shoe size) and while they were ok, i thought they might have shrunk a bit in the washer/dryer so i ordered more in the 8-10 size. these are perfect! they are the first liners i've purchased that do not slip (and i've truly tried about 6 different promising brands on amazon after much research). with my sauconys, no area of this liner shows. my only wish is that they were seamless. no actual rubbing, but it would be nice as the 7-7.5s had some loose ends. haven't noticed with these 8-10s. very happy - FINALLY found my liners.
customer_reviews.author: Aware in Texas (yes there are some of us!)

customer_reviews.title: No show Socks
customer_reviews.text: I like the socks pretty much. The fit is good and most of the time there is no slippage. What I don't like about them is the elastic. By the end of the day, the elastic is digging in . I have RA and neurothpy so my feet are pretty tender I wish that someone come up with a way to make the socks stay put w/o elastic. They are a lot better than tennis shoe socks.
customer_reviews.author: Rustyroses

customer_reviews.title: One week in and already one pair down
customer_reviews.text: I saw that these were supposed to be the best no show socks so I purchased without hesitation. I wore one pair for the first time and by the end of the day both of my big toes were sticking through the socks. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K.

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend these No-Show socks.
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend these socks! I recently purchased a couple of named brand No-Show socks in two different stores. Both times I was deeply disappointed when the socks did not stay over my heels and I would end up having my sock only covering my toes to my arch. As you can imagine, it is very uncomfortable to wear the socks that way. After wearing my socks like that on a vacation, I decided I needed to look for a highly rated recommendation. These socks have a high rating on Amazon, so I purchased them. The wonderful reviews are well deserved.
customer_reviews.author: Chappy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: These socks are described as thin, but I expected them to be at least substantial. They are so thin that when I put a gray sock on my foot I could see through it to my foot. They are the thinnest socks I’ve ever had. Might send these back for the nice non-slip ones I ordered previously. These are the right size, though, to wear without being seen with slip-on sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Ragan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend buying the size up
customer_reviews.text: My first order (medium) fit my feet perfectly, but I wish I had followed the advice of some of the reviews and ordered a size larger because their big toes quickly started poking through the sock. I now have the large size, and that eliminates my concern. The socks are very comfortable and soft. I especially appreciate the flat band that goes around my feet. Some other brands of socks have a rough, braided elastic that goes around the feet. One way to improve the sock is to work on making the toe seams softer and flatter because after a few hours, they become quite uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KittyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Just right...!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always looking for the right size and thickness for socks that are not visible but provide a layer of support, prevent rubbing & calluses, protect shoes from sweating, etc.. I’m surprised to see in other reviews that socks have quickly developed holes. I haven’t had that problem at all. In commiseration with another reviewer, I do have trouble finding them after washing...they do “stick” to other clothing & can be difficult to find. All that said, I like them. I’ve recently ordered my second package set of Eedor’s!
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: A little small and thin
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is thing, which is exacerbated by it being too small. Putting it on my foot stretches it out way too much, so you get holes within the first few wears. The elastic around the top rim is way too tight and leaves a sore red mark after wearing for a day. My shoe size is a 7.5 or 8, depending on the brand, and I bought the 7-7.5" size because my foot measures 9.25 inches long and I hate loose socks. I would probably go a size up if I were to buy these again, but I will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A Worthy No Show Sock!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are the bomb! My search for the perfect “no show” is over. You wouldn’t think it would be so difficult to make decent socks, evidently it is. In the past, I’ve had socks that creep down under the heel and bunch up under my arch or equally annoying don’t cover the full extent of my toes. I seriously do NOT have Hobbit feet. I always ended up disappointed- until now. Highly recommend. They are soft, comfortable, good coverage, good fit. My feet are happy- I am happy. Of course they arrived quickly, no issues with packaging. I’ll keep these in stock!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!  They actually stay on your feet!
customer_reviews.text: These are my FAVORITE no show sock liners - I'm on my second pack because I wear them so much! They have NEVER slipped off of my heel or gotten loose, even after repeated washings. Note that these won't work for most dressy or ballet flats - they come too far up the top of your foot in the toe area. But they are perfect for Toms, Converse, and just about any slip on or regular athletic shoe. I have tried several other sock brands from Fila to other department store brands, and they all end up in the trash because they won't stay on my foot. These are definite keepers!!!
customer_reviews.author: randsom

customer_reviews.title: These socks are won’t drop down your heel.
customer_reviews.text: These footsies are awesome. I gave up wearing this type of sock years ago because the heel would slide under my foot. The Eedor product has improved on the old design by incorporating a small rubberized area near the top of the heel area. They really stay up! I’ve even worn them in boots, around the house without shoes and to bed. After numerous washings, they still stay up throughout the day, and they are super comfortable. That little spot that hold up your sock can not be felt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Fever

customer_reviews.title: Nice sock, but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I could get the socks on my feet, but they were tight in length. My toes could not fully extend and they were difficult to slip onto my foot because the opening is not elastic enough to allow an easy fit. I gave the socks to my granddaughter and she loves them and would buy them again. I wear a size 10 shoe. She wears an 8. I guess my feet are just too big for this sock. The product is made in Korea.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brown

customer_reviews.title: but they work great with my loafers and any other shoe that has ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pair of "footies" that don't slip off and bunch up under my heels! Can you wear them with low cut shoes? No, but they work great with my loafers and any other shoe that has more coverage. Sometimes you just don't want the look of socks creeping out of your shoes but you want your foot covered--these are perfect for that!
customer_reviews.author: boat gal

customer_reviews.title: The Best Non-Slip Socks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of three of these non-slip socks going back about a year ago. I loved them so much, I wanted to order more. I did a general search, but I couldn't find this particular brand, so I ordered about six other types of non-slip socks. They don't even compare. These are, by far, the best. They stay in place and they are extremely comfortable. I ended up going back again and searching until I found this exact brand and ordered them again. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: KayCee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and no smelly/stinky feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have exclusively been wearing socks similar to these for years, but a problem with the other brands is that sometimes the socks end up slightly smelling like feet after a long day, and cause my shoes to smell. I decided to look for a sock made out of thicker, more absorbent material. This sock is perfect! It is thick but not too thick for all of my shoes, comfortable, stays on my feet, and at the end of a long day of miles of walking in Europe everything still smelled fresh! I immediately purchased more.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.I.

customer_reviews.title: I'm honestly confused by the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: Whether there was a manufacturing mistake at some point or I just got a good batch, I'm not really sure, but these are by far the best non slip no show socks I've ever owned. I'm lead to believe that possibly some buyers are buying the wrong size. I typically wear a size 8-8.5 and I bought the largest size. They're perfect. I've had them for a few months now and I wear them every day with my slip on vans. These have definitely recieved some wear at this point and I don't have a single issue. Like I said, I'm confused. Size up if you're unsure.
customer_reviews.author: MeganBell

customer_reviews.title: Thin with good fit
customer_reviews.text: I have long feet with average width. When I got them they looked small but the fit is great. They are not quite to my ankles which is what I was looking for. They are short but they don't slip off. Thin but durable which is exactly what I was looking for. A win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Meesha77

customer_reviews.title: Working for me so far ... black ones lasted longer than grey?
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Only worn a few days, but no slippage on the heel (big problem with my other no-show socks), comfy, fit well. UPDATE: I own these socks in black and grey. The black ones are fantastic, and I’ve been wearing them for months with no issues. The grey ones arrived a little over a month ago, and already have holes in the toes :/ Anyone know if the black version is made of a different/better material? I wash them the same, and wear them with the same shoes, and only the grey ones have busted.
customer_reviews.author: A shopper

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Comfy, Won't Slip
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite socks. They're no-show, the boat shape and grips keep them from sliding down, and they're soft! I'm not kidding - I use these for running, hiking, and working, in tennis shoes and boots, and I never even think about them. I've bought them twice and am about to buy a ton more. FYI - I don't know if it's a fluke or if it has to do with the dye, but the gray ones are a little softer and more forgiving than the black ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jennaaz

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not like these at all. I bought them for me to wear with dress shoes. I did not like them in any way. However, I sent them to my mom and she thinks they are the greatest so I rated them a 5 in all areas. I have never worn these type of socks and this is what my mom has always worn. She says these are the best she has ever had, they stay put, they are comfortable and she has never seen any like these before she is very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace other "no show" socks that had a cord-like line of elastic all the way around the opening, which hurt after wearing shoes over them for a few hours. These are super-comfortable, and I gladly threw all my others away. I like them being very thin, because I live in a warm climate, and my 6-pack was definitely 6 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Quebec2

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but so nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love these no show socks so much that I'm about to order another pack! They have a non-slip grip so they don't slip off in your shoe, which has happened a couple times but I was wearing booties and I just think I needed thicker socks. They are thin and just perfect for tennis shoes, I have worn them several times, at work and walking around a ball park all day and had no problem at all! They wash & dry fine, no holes or rips but ball up a little in the dryer and I'm digging around in the a.m. searching for my baby socks. I am a true size 7 and they fit perfectly..you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Crich1126

customer_reviews.title: They are great!
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found some socks that fit and stay on my foot as they should when wearing flats or shoes that I don't want to wear athletic short socks . These cover my foot just enough for the shoes to cover them and they actually stay on my heel! I am so glad I tried them. They are awesome. It seems most socks are not long enough therefore pulling down on the heel, but these actually fit size wise therefore staying up on the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Hill Country Lady

customer_reviews.title: They shrink. Big time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I live in the South and cool socks are a must in closed shoes. These were great until I washed them. After washing they shrunk to the size of an infants foot. They stretch out when you put them on, but uncomfortably tight. Hate them. My husband cant stop laughing at them. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: SKSJ

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, but thin (and busted day 1)
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed these socks as far as fit goes, though they were pretty thin. It didn't end up bothering me during the day, but by the end, a small hole started on one of my big toes (with short, pedicured nails). Disappointed for my first (and only) use so far, but hopeful the others will last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: moxylady

customer_reviews.title: Wears holes in toes quickly
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would love these because they have the right thickness, elasticity and non-slip heel, but the toes wear holes in them immediately. I keep my toenails trimmed quite short so this is just a poor quality thing I haven't seen in all my other socks like this. You have to reinforce toes in this kind of sock. I didn't have them a year and have thrown most of them away - it's hard to even mend that part when the fabric is so shoddy.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are fantastic! As soon as they came in the mail, I tried these socks on with my boat shoes and there's some slight peeking of sock from the edges, but it's barely noticeable. The silicone heel strip at the back really keeps the sock secured in place and there is no slipping off if your shoe raises off your foot when you're walking. I've only washed them one and there was no shrinking at all and I'm not sure how the heel silicone will be after more wash cycles, but I hope it lasts! I would happily buy these socks again!
customer_reviews.author: Clara Leung

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: These "no show" socks are designed differently than any other brand I've ever purchased. They fit very well and don't slip off my heel. They do have a nonslip pad (that you don't feel) inside the top of the sock at your heel. I have washed them in the washer but didn't put them in the dryer. They still fit my foot correctly and don't slip.Just take notice how far they come up on the top of your foot. If you're wearing dressy flats or heels I'm pretty sure they would show. I'm buying more.
customer_reviews.author: G A Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Truly no slip, but has cons
customer_reviews.text: PROS: They stay on all day. No slip. No show. CONS: Very thin material (however I’m not having the problem of my toenails ripping through the socks like others are having. I keep my nails very short & smooth.) They make my feet more sweaty than my other socks. They go down too low in the front imo. They also run small. I am very sensitive to tight things. If you are to, order a size up. I’m a 7.5-8.5 shoe size, I ordered the 8-11 size & they still feel too tight. Edit: I recently ordered another brand. Buy those instead. They are thicker and otherwise the same. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the socks! I needed a pair of socks that would not show but not slip off my foot either. These socks are perfect! There is a little no-slip patch in the heel of the sock that keeps it in place and is still very comfortable. Also I like that the socks don't have a seam at the toe but instead the seam is across top of your foot. This is so much more comfortable than normal socks! I absolutely LOVE these and would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: KRossmiller

customer_reviews.title: Just thick enough, fitted and don't show
customer_reviews.text: These no-show socks are well-made and don't slip off, like other socks I've purchased. The fabric is thick enough so that toenails don't pop through, like might happen with a thinner sock. I wear a 9-9.5 US, and the large size is just a tad snug, so that I'm ready to remove them after a full day's wear. Despite that, I'm buying another pack of these to wear with some shoes that I thought I was destined to wear without socks... but these make it possible.
customer_reviews.author: Julia I. Tavis

customer_reviews.title: No more digging socks out of the back of your shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the cut on these socks—perfect for lower-cut Converse-style shoes. Just low enough in the front to not show and just high enough in the back to not slip off the heel-especially with the appreciated rubber grip at the back of the heel. They are soft, but a bit thin. They remind me a bit of a stretchy tee, so I recommend keeping nails trimmed. They are awesome at staying on your feet-probably because of that stretchiness. At the end of the day, I do feel that slight pressure on the tips of my toes, but it’s worth it to have such perfectly-fitting socks I am not digging out of the back of my shoes all day.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These socks are comfortable, they stay in place really well on my heel too. They should be worn with tennis shoes or sneakers so they don't show. I'm a size 8-8.5 and they fit me really well but they don't fit snuggly, but I don't need my socks to provide support so they work really well for me and I really like the nude color. I have washed them and the rubber grips weren't affected at all. Would buy from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST NO SHOW SOCKS EVER! Comfortable all day with no stretch or ride up problems . LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these no-show socks! I have tried pair after pair of other brands, and they either slide off, hurt my heel, or are too short. These Endor Thin Casual No Show Socks are the best ever and are as comfy as can be, even when I wear them for several hours of dance practice. Well worth the money, but I hope they don’t go up. I’ve even washed them a few times, and they didn’t loose their shape or stretch out. I’ve ordered them twice now after being sold upon my first wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Lady

customer_reviews.title: Heel stays in place 💯
customer_reviews.text: These stay in place 100%!!! I’ve spent so much money on this type of stock to wear with my boots or shoes (not for working out although I’m sure you could). I will be tossing all my other ones... except Lululemon which work fine in my workout shoes...they were expensive! I’ve work them several times with boots and casual sneakers and a regular shoe. No slipping off the heel, not one bit!!! The toe is a tiny bit tight by the end of the day from pulling but that heel is right where it started! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stays in place, sizing as described
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for socks like this that would stay on my long feet - many "one size" socks are just too short/tight for me. These are perfect - the sizing options really help, and the grip on the heel is effective. I've worn them with "cutie sneakers" and with high-heeled oxfords for work. I ended up ordering a second set because my first set is working so well. I have not machine washed them though - I hand wash them to make sure the grips stay on. I had a different brand that I machine washed and the grips all came off.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy fabric and poor fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for trip to Scotland in July since i would be doing a lot of walking. These socks hurt the back of my heel and felt scratchy. They also do not cover the instep area where the tongue of my Mephisto walking shoes hit. In 80 degree weather while hiking the Scottish Highlands, these socks were an absolute bomb. I ended up buying regular athletic socks at a local store.
customer_reviews.author: NESouthernbelle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, comfy, don't slip off your heel
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear with my Sperry boat shoes and they work perfect. Can't see the socks at all so doesn't matter which color I'm wearing. I like the sticky band along the heel that keeps them from sliding down into my shoe while I'm wearing them. I'm a size 8-8.5 and they are just fine for fit. I have been wearing them all summer and none of my pairs have ripped so not sure if they have changed the fabric from the time of all the negative reviews mentioning holes. I'm excited that I found some no-shoe socks that work so well. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ted and Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to wear with sneakers at the gym
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to wear at the gym, because they are a cotton blend and I was hoping they'd help with wicking away the moisture and heat. I also liked that they came higher up on the top of foot then other brands I've tried. The ones that just cover the tips of my toes and tend to fall off. These were perfect. They stayed secure and fit and kept my feet from getting too sweaty. I will be back to purchase more later after I see how these hold up after a few washings.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hostess

customer_reviews.title: Socks Too Small
customer_reviews.text: These socks seem well made but if you wear a size shoe larger than a 7, they probably won't fit. They run very small. Also, I noticed the toe seam line runs across your foot and crosses your big and little toes at the "bunion" area. If you have a bunion this could be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: WindRider

customer_reviews.title: They stay on my feet!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the color was a little darker but it doesn't really matter too much I guess. These are the first "peds" socks which I really love. They come pretty high on the foot so you couldn't wear them with ballet type flats. They seem to be a pretty good quality fabric and are very comfortable. I've worn 2 pairs already and both have stayed on my feet all day long. Usually I find one sock slips off my foot within 5 minutes, but not with these. I would definitely recommend them if this is the type of sock you are looking for. I will definitely buy them again when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: auntannie

customer_reviews.title: best no show sock and never moves out of place
customer_reviews.text: These are great for dress shoes or athletic shoes. These socks never slide off my heel and they are comfortable. I have bought 3 or more sets for myself and my daughter. I don't even bother with high end athletic brands anymore because I've tried them all and these are by far the best fit and price. I've had them for over a year and no holes or wear in mine although my daughters have some wear in hers but she wears them more often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Don't Slip!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the first pair of no show socks that actually didn't slip off of my heal! I absolutely love these and went ahead and ordered a six pack to go along with this three pack I already have. They are comfortable and soft, and stay put all day! I wear them with my Toms and my Bobs and I am so happy I ran across them. Nothing else ever worked. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie's Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: Non slip/slide/fall down when you walk!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! For the first time ever these little sock booties fit well and did not slip down during wear! I’m so impressed! They don’t go as far back as the pic shows (on the arch), but they do cover toe cleavage. I really, really feel like I’ve lucked out on this find! You can’t see them when you wear Chucks (converse), or Toms slip-on’s. Perfect! I get to keep that summer casual look but also help my feet with that bare-feet-summer-sweat that would otherwise occur. Buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Makes a noise as I walk
customer_reviews.text: I know this is weird, but as I wear these socks and walk, they make a squeaky noise as they rub the inside my shoes. I've worn them with my slip on Keds and Nike running shoes and I get the same noise as I'm walking. The socks are a slick material on the outside. I think if they were all cotton, they wouldn't do this. They do not slip off of my foot, which is great, but the noise is keeping me from wearing them. I'll probably return them.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks! I've tried "no-show" socks before and they always slip down. These ones NEVER slip down. I wear them every day. I will say they are a little tight and can get uncomfortable by the end of the day, but I think that's necessary in order to keep them from slipping down. I am taking off one star because the toe is starting to rip. If the toe were a thicker fabric or reinforced to avoid ripping, these would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU HAVE A LATEX ALLERGY
customer_reviews.text: These socks were unbearable within minutes after putting on. I have a topical latex allergy, so I have to avoid certain lotions, face masks, elastic, and adhesives. Whatever adhesive or elastic is in these socks are a NO GO. Also, side note, they shrivel up like a week old booger in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: m70s

customer_reviews.title: Not What I'd Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: These are thin and don't feel as cotton-y/supportive as others I've purchased. Yes, they don't slip; perhaps it's because they're tight straight from the package (I wear a women's size 8 shoe), and shrink even more after washing! My feet got sweaty in these and it felt like my shoe was awkwardly rubbing against the sole. Maybe they're best with ballet flats; I wore mine with converse.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Best no-show socks ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best no- show socks I’ve ever worn! They’re a thinner sock, which is what I prefer, and they come up a little higher on the top of the foot, making them comfortable with athletic shoes. Best of all, the heel doesn’t slide down into my shoes when I’m walking! I wear a size 8 shoe, but ordered the smaller size so I wouldn’t have any extra length, and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: annie714

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, quality, and value!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Nike no-show socks as well as others, the quality, value and fit of these were great. It has the rubber no-slip strip on the inside back of the heal. I liked the thickness of them- they’re not super thin like I’m worried they’ll get a hole but not thick and hot either. The fit was spot on. I ordered based off of my shoe size. The expensive Nike version of these same socks were too tight and way more expensive than these. Jennifer Reed from @thesisterstudioig recommended these and they did not disappoint. Thanks Jen!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Hands down THE BEST no show socks
customer_reviews.text: When I say I have tried EVERY no show sock out there I mean it. I love to wear low cut booties, deck shoes, and converse. I tried no show slipper socks from DSW and the fall right off when I take my shoes off. I tried the ones from Journeys and they're too thick and bunch up in the back of the shoe. These stay IN PLACE when you put on your shoes and take them off. I will be buying more in all colors!
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA G.

customer_reviews.title: Sent only 3 pairs instead of the 8 pairs I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these socks before. I ordered more because they keep getting holes on the toe. While this is annoying, this is the best pair I have found. They are soft, they stay on, and they are perfect for boat shoes. These socks give my feet enough coverage to prevent blisters on the upper part of my foot. However I ordered the 8 pair; two of each color. I received 3 pair of black.
customer_reviews.author: turquisehearts78

customer_reviews.title: They come off while you walk!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that these "invisible" socks would stay on my foot while I walked, but they didn't. I had to stop and reposition the sock several times while walking through the airport yesterday. They kept slipping off my heel. This was a little disappointing and a lot inconvenient. And they're not all that invisible, either.
customer_reviews.author: LRR

customer_reviews.title: Time will be the big test!  Interested in how long they last; over a season would be great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit reserved! I am wondering how well these will stand up to washing, before the substance that keeps them from slipping around wears off! I also wonder if they will stretch a bit with wear and washing! It will be okay if they do, because they are a bit tight in the length! They do stay in place, and that is a plus! I have had dozens of this type of sock, and they all ended up coming off my hels!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small. Too thin. Too everything.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 7.5-10 size (I wear a size 7.5, and have a medium-width foot, very average) and these socks are uncomfortably tight in the toes. I can tell my toes will break through shortly. The heels also slip off. Again, I have an “average” type foot. The fit is ridiculously bad. The socks slipped off from the first moment I put them on. The “grip” material they have in the back heel to keep them from slipping simply curled up. Don’t waste your money. I am returning these.
customer_reviews.author: LiliRoze

customer_reviews.title: Hole in Toe Area After Wearing Once
customer_reviews.text: I picked these socks because of the great ratings. They're nice looking, comfortable and stay put very well - no sliding off the feet. I wore one pair and everything was fine. The next day I wore another pair and by the end of the day there was a hole in the big toe area of one of the socks. This wasn't caused by my toenail, as my nails are cut very short and smooth. Now I have one less pair of socks after wearing them once. Not good quality after all.
customer_reviews.author: SayWhat!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, but wish they were a little sturdier. Searched high and low for perfect thin socks and tried a few brands before finding these. I can see how my toes might break through the tops after a while, but maybe I'll try the bigger size next time. Bought the Saucony no shows but they're very thick, and also Ordenado brand but they're not made well and have a weird pucker by the heel.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Forget the "Peds", THESE ARE AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn "Peds" FOR YEARS and never knew there was something ( SO MUCH ) better . These little sock-ettes are simply WONDERFUL! They have this very comfortable (sort of) "spongy" inside to them but MOST IMPORTANTLY (unlike the "PEDS" they stay ON because of an ingenious thin silicone strip ( that you can't even feel) inside of the heel which keeps the little "sock" from slipping off of the foot ( which has always made me CRAZY LOL . My feet sweat a lot and these kept them dry and fresh , what more can I say? I did not receive anything for my positive review.
customer_reviews.author: CHINATOUCHE1

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two more packs!
customer_reviews.text: In an effort to be balanced I try and write reviews that are critical if necessary and full of praise when due. These socks deserve praise! I wear a size 9 shoe and ordered the size 9-11 in white and they fit perfectly. I have never had luck with no show socks because they slip and are uncomfortable. I love to wear slip on sneakers and flats but don't like to go barefoot. Now I don't have to. These socks don't slip at all and keep my feet dry. I ended up ordering 2 extra packs for the inevitable loss of pairs.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Useless after they are washed
customer_reviews.text: Initially loved them but after the first wash they shrink and lose their "stick". Every pair that has been washed slips off my foot in the first 2 minutes and continually after that. They are basically useless after they are washed. I have thrown them away because they are too frustrating to try to keep on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Naptime4Jules

customer_reviews.title: These work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations for these thin no-show socks because I have very long narrow feet and I have never had any success with shoe liners. They are always either too short or too wide. I ordered large, washed them first, and they work! I won't use these for exercise. They are very thin and not soft or cozy. But they are great light weight liners for when you want to wear shoes with no socks showing. The rubbery grip on the backs of the ankles work great for me as I have very thin ankles. I'm pleasantly surprised and so glad I tried them.
customer_reviews.author: Art Person

customer_reviews.title: as my shoes where already a little tighter than I like. These work perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to where with my clogs. I work in the lab and on my feet most of the day. I needed some sort of sock but one that did not add too much, as my shoes where already a little tighter than I like. These work perfect. They don't slide down into my shoes either. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: I love these socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! I have purchased so many no show socks that I have two tubs filled with ones that roll under my foot in my shoe. I am so pleased these socks are different. These work perfectly as no show socks with my TomsI just need to see how they hold up in the wash prior to wearing them again to be truly sold. I will update after I do this. Update: I have washed and reworn, and I love these socks! They haven't stretched out, and they are perfectly on my feet inside my shoes. I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: TeachShea

customer_reviews.title: A total loss
customer_reviews.text: These things are TIGHT. As in cutting-off-circulation tight. I'm not fat and my feet are an average size (7-1/2). I donated them to Goodwill because they were cheap enough that returning them wasn't worth the bother.
customer_reviews.author: Allegra C.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: these no show socks are super comfortable. i love the ankle grip so it can help stay on my feet. i use them when wearing low cut vans, my chucks, and some booties. i havent noticed any tearing in the socks either. they are thick and soft.
customer_reviews.author: madison

customer_reviews.title: They are truly non slip!
customer_reviews.text: These socks do exactly what I was hoping they would do! They totally stay put even during a workout. The 4 colors cover all the bases and these are my go to socks. The only problem is that they are so small and light it is easy to loose them in the pant legs and sleeves of other clothing being washed. I have gone to using a laundry bag to keep them together.
customer_reviews.author: SUSIE THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy
customer_reviews.text: Finally!! These STAY on. With a boat style shoe or sneaker you don’t seem them. They are a good thickness. They won’t wear out in the toe quickly and are warm but they don’t feel bulky. I wear a woman’s size 8 and these fit just right. I’m happy! I’ve tossed so many no show style socks because they fall off, rip in the toe area or feel terrible on. These just stay on and feel good!!
customer_reviews.author: AFB

customer_reviews.title: Stays on and super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my chucks, my rocket dog slip on, and walking shoes. After walking all day in various different airports and terminals these socks stayed on. I can’t say that for other low cut socks, I’ve had issues where the heel would just come off completely and ball under my arch. I’ve had to tug them up towards the end of the long day, but to me that’s a non-issue.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer_Cali

customer_reviews.title: These don’t slip when you walk
customer_reviews.text: These no show socks are the best ones I’ve ever used. I’m usually digging no show socks out from under my heel after a short time wearing them. But not these! I walked around Disneyland for 3 days and not one time did these socks slip. They were comfortable and stayed in place. I used 2 different shoes while I was there and didn’t have a problem with then slipping with either shoe. They are thin socks but I haven’t had problems with them wearing down and causing holes. I walked an average of 10 miles each day and these were great! I’m throwing my other no show socks away!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Best No show socks
customer_reviews.text: A lot of socks are for sizes 5-11, no wonder it doesn’t stay in place because they are too big for me. These socks fit me perfectly because they are made in different sizes, thank you Eedor. I shall be buying more Update: I like the fact that they have variety of sizes not just one size fits all. I noticed my toe breaks through the socks, perhaps I got a bad batch that omitted sewing of that back. Also makes swoosh embarrassing noise. I thought it was the pair of shoes I wore that was making noise but had same problem with a pair of sneakers. Sad!
customer_reviews.author: Bola

customer_reviews.title: Stay in place!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for converse and vans. I've never had to reach in my shoe to dig them out! They've been run thru the wash a few times now and I'm afraid the elasticity might be wearing some, but I don't mind I'll buy another pair! I also wanted to point out the texture of the socks, they feel soft and thicker than the flimsy no-shows I wear with my work flats, but not as thick and plushy as the ones I wear for my work out shoes. They're the perfect thickness for ath-leisure tennis shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great socks! They actually feel like you are wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: Great socks! They actually feel like you are wearing socks vs wearing those tiny little things that fall off after one second of use! These stay on like champs! Haven't had any problems wearing these; even using different types of shoes. My only problem with these was the fact that mine got a hole in the toe after the first use, Take this with a grain of salt because my toes are unique in that they tend to point upwards. All my shoes show wear at the same spot so I don't feel it reflects poorly on the socks, just have annoying toes. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Turley

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love these socks. They're thin, very soft and comfy, don't slip down in Skechers, and the elastic band is wider than average. But, they squished my size 10 feet (toes) so they were sore mid day. The description says they fit up to a size 11........I don't think so! Unfortunately, they will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: shoppergirl

customer_reviews.title: Decent No Show Socks
customer_reviews.text: They are decent socks. They have done good so far as to the durability of them but the biggest downfall for me was how thin they are. You can pretty well see your feet through them. I have also been impressed with the way they stay on. In the past I have gotten socks to where they constantly slip off my feet but these I have not had any problems with that.
customer_reviews.author: Brit W.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised!! I haven't had luck with no show socks in the past. They always slip and bunch and fall inside my shoe. I also have a hard time finding socks that fit well with my size 11 foot. These socks stay completely put inside my shoes. Zero slippage. They have a nice back, that keeps my heel from rubbing and blistering, but still stays out of sight. I have to say pleasantly surprised. I'll update after they have been worn and washed multiple times if they lose their shape or ability to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a bit more expensive than similar options
customer_reviews.text: these are fine - nice and thin socks that won't show with regular shoes. the front seam is pretty far back behind your toes so that felt a little weird, but not a big deal. i ordered some other similar options at the same time and those had the seam in a more normal place and the pricing was a bit better as well.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: These socks do their job as a no show sock ...
customer_reviews.text: These socks do their job as a no show sock. They don’t ride down and they fit true to size. They are very thin, however, and after a few uses and washes, they started to get holes. I don’t use them as an everyday sock so it’s not a big deal to me and they weren’t over priced but just be aware that they may not last as long as other socks if you use them frequently.
customer_reviews.author: K P

product_meta.title: Eedor Women's 3 to 8 Pairs Thin No Show Socks Non Slip Flat Boat Line
feature_bullets: STAY IN PLACE: They provide you with an elastic band that slides over your heel and a silicone grip that prevents slipping throught the day.

TRUE NO SHOW: These low-profile socks work well with a variety of low-profile shoes including tennis shoes, running shoes, boat shoes, slip ons like toms, vans, converse, sneakers, skechers, and booties.

NOT TOO THICK, NOT TOO THIN: To provide you with comfort and not too hot feeling, we crafted it not too thick or paper thin. You can avoid being too bulky, and enjoy the perfect balance between comfort and support.

HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: 80% premium cotton / 20% spandex blend. So this will be breathable, soft to the touch and stretchy, without losing their shape over time. We recommend pull socks around your toe to enjoy more relaxed fit and to make it more no show.

3 DIFFERENT SIZES AVAILABLE: Our no show socks fit US women's shoe sizes 5-6.5 (8.5"-9.05"), US women's shoe sizes 7-7.5 (9.25"-9.38") and US women's shoe sizes 8-10 (9.5"-10.2"). If you are confused between two sizes, we recommend a larger size for more relaxed fit.
